etymologies: late 18th century: from French, from Galibi

definitions: a small forest-dwelling South American monkey of the marmoset family, typically brightly colored and with tufts and crests of hair around the face and neck.

notes.text: Genera Saguinus and Leontopithecus, family Callitrichidae (or Callithricidae): several species

shortDefinitions: small forest-dwelling South American monkey of marmoset family
